alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:26AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wharton, southeastern Jackson and northwestern Matagorda Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 826 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Blessing, or 10 miles northwest of Palacios, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bay City, Palacios, La Ward, Blessing, Markham, Van Vleck, Midfield and Danevang. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton
